product_overview: Creator OS is a decision support system tailored for creators to efficiently track and manage brand deals, gain insights into brand briefs, and confidently price their collaborations using AI-powered tools. The platform combines deal management with analytical and pricing utilities to empower creators in their business interactions.
core_goals: Provide creators with a centralized platform to manage and visualize brand deals through a Kanban-style board.
Enable detailed tracking and historical context for individual deals with metadata and interaction timelines.
Leverage AI to analyze brand briefs for risks and opportunities, helping creators understand deal contexts more deeply.
Offer an AI-driven rate checking tool to estimate optimal deal pricing and improve negotiation confidence.
Ensure a user-friendly, responsive interface that integrates routing, authentication, and consistent global data management for a seamless user experience.
key_features: App Core: Manages routing, authentication states, and global data essential for smooth app operation.
Layout & Navigation: Responsive app shell with sidebar navigation for easy access to all features.
Deal Board: Kanban-style layout for visualizing deals across various states with drag-and-drop capability.
Deal Detail & Timeline: Detailed deal view with metadata and interaction history timeline for context and progress tracking.
Deal Creation Modal: Supports standard deal entry and panic mode quick-save for fast deal logging.
Note Analysis Tool (Brief Translator): AI-powered analysis of brand briefs highlighting potential risks and opportunities.
Rate Checker Tool: AI-powered calculator to estimate appropriate pricing for brand deals.
Services & API Integration: Backend connectivity with Supabase for data storage and Gemini AI for AI features.
user_flow_summary: User logs in and is presented with the main app shell including the sidebar for navigation.
User navigates to the Deal Board to view all brand deals organized in a Kanban layout by status.
User creates a new deal through the New Deal Modal, choosing standard or panic (quick-save) mode.
User selects a deal card to open the Deal Detail view with associated timeline and interaction history.
User uses the Brief Translator tool to input and analyze brand briefs for insights and risk factors.
User accesses the Rate Checker tool to input deal parameters and receive AI-driven pricing suggestions.
User logs out or switches between app sections using the sidebar navigation.
validation_criteria: All routing and authentication workflows function correctly and securely.
Deal Board accurately reflects deal statuses and allows for deal manipulation without data loss.
Deal Detail displays comprehensive metadata and timeline data for each deal with no inconsistencies.
New Deal Modal correctly supports both standard and panic modes, saving data appropriately.
AI-powered Brief Translator provides actionable analysis on brand briefs with reasonable accuracy.
Rate Checker delivers consistent and relevant pricing suggestions based on deal inputs.
Responsive UI maintains usability and aesthetic consistency across devices and screen sizes.
Backend services for Supabase and Gemini AI operate reliably with proper error handling and latency constraints.
